title: Are there any challenger master Yi mains?
body:
I know about Cowsep but apparently he's Diamond 3 or something close. I'm just wondering if it's possible to get challenger mostly playing Yi.

I'm in plat 4 and seem to be doing well enough with him after I learnt a few tricks while playing him but how far can you take this champ?

Was weedwacker every high challenger?

replies.body:
I am a challenged master yi player, does that count??

Guys???

> [{quoted}](name=Orvix,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=21gYVbre,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2014-12-07T08:53:49.639+0000)
>
> Cowsep is Challenger in KR

no, is diamond

> [{quoted}](name=torrentejoan,realm=EUW,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=21gYVbre,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-06-25T12:25:30.726+0000)
>
> no, is diamond, he was challenger 2 years ago
Afaik Cowsep used to be challenger, then something happened idk what
Thornmail is such a comical way to counter Yi. Yi just builds Maw and calls it a day. Randuins is where it's at m80.
Yi just builds BoRK and Thornmail is like "hurrrr I don't know how to reflect your bonus damage" and he kills you anyway.
weedwacker was challenger at one point, godbless.

I logged in to remind oce of it's true solo queue god.
Bless weedwacker

cowsep was challenger at some point back in season 3 i guess, and he was Master in season 4, i am a big fan of his stream, and he said the reason he is not trying hard to reach Master/Challenger becasue of the Q times, and fact that the korean server players they are so toxic and they are full of afk's and they get super tilted very easly, plus he love to have fun on his master yi plays thats why he always do these stupid chases and he always dives players and just have fun, but if he put on his tryhard pants he can easly reach Master at least with his Master Yi goodness, I mean he reached D1 90LP in NA playing master yi with 190ms, what if he was playing with 9 like in korea, trust me he will reach challenger!
I'm a diamond 4 Master Yi main. I know that's not challenger, but if you want any tips or to theorycraft, send me a friend request and I'll be happy to chat.
